info.title: La Pesadilla de Ripollés DEMO1
info.author: PiX Juegos
info.description: Classic beat'em up featuring Castellón and its artist Ripollés
info.details:
Features:
- 4 players at the same time (not working right now)
- 4 different game modes
- 2 different characters
- 2 levels
- 6 different enemies
- 3 enemy bosses
...
